languages.text: "Я, кхм, всегда желал лишь уважения, а не страха. Приятно знать, что мои старания не прошли даром. Благодарю... что рассказали об этом".
"I, ahem, have always desired only respect, not fear. It is good to know that my efforts have not been in vain. Thank you... for telling me."
languages.original_text: "Я, кхм, всегда желал лишь уважения, а не страха. Приятно знать, что мои старания не прошли даром. Благодарю... что рассказали об этом".

traits.locale_text: "I, ahem, have always desired only respect, not fear. It is good to know that my efforts have not been in vain. Thank you... for telling me."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I, ahem, have always desired only respect, not fear. It is good to know that my efforts have not been in vain. Thank you... for telling me."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I, ahem, have always desired only respect, not fear. It is good to know that my efforts have not been in vain. Thank you... for telling me."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I, ahem, have always desired only respect, not fear. It is good to know that my efforts have not been in vain. Thank you... for telling me."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我，咳咳，我一直希望人们尊重我是出于敬意，而非恐惧。我很高兴我的努力没有白费，谢谢你……告诉我这件事情。”
languages.original_text: "I, ahem, have always desired only respect, not fear. It is good to know that my efforts have not been in vain. Thank you... for telling me."

traits.locale_text: “我，咳咳，我一直希望人们尊重我是出于敬意，而非恐惧。我很高兴我的努力没有白费，谢谢你……告诉我这件事情。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai... ahem... toujours voulu inspirer le respect, et non la peur. Je suis content de voir que mes efforts ont porté leurs fruits. Merci... de me l'avoir dit. »
languages.original_text: "I, ahem, have always desired only respect, not fear. It is good to know that my efforts have not been in vain. Thank you... for telling me."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai... ahem... toujours voulu inspirer le respect, et non la peur. Je suis content de voir que mes efforts ont porté leurs fruits. Merci... de me l'avoir dit. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich, ähem, habe mir immer nur Respekt gewünscht, nicht Furcht. Es ist gut zu wissen, dass meine Bemühungen nicht umsonst waren. Danke ... dass Ihr es mir gesagt habt."
languages.original_text: "I, ahem, have always desired only respect, not fear. It is good to know that my efforts have not been in vain. Thank you... for telling me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich, ähem, habe mir immer nur Respekt gewünscht, nicht Furcht. Es ist gut zu wissen, dass meine Bemühungen nicht umsonst waren. Danke ... dass Ihr es mir gesagt habt."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「私は、ごほん、私は常に、恐れではなく、尊敬だけを望んできた。私の努力が無駄ではなかったとわかってよかった。教えてくれて…ありがとう」
languages.original_text: "I, ahem, have always desired only respect, not fear. It is good to know that my efforts have not been in vain. Thank you... for telling me."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、ごほん、私は常に、恐れではなく、尊敬だけを望んできた。私の努力が無駄ではなかったとわかってよかった。教えてくれて…ありがとう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Esto... siempre he buscado el respeto y no el miedo. Me alegro de saber que mis esfuerzos no han sido en vano. Gracias... por contármelo».
languages.original_text: "I, ahem, have always desired only respect, not fear. It is good to know that my efforts have not been in vain. Thank you... for telling me."

traits.locale_text: «Esto... siempre he buscado el respeto y no el miedo. Me alegro de saber que mis esfuerzos no han sido en vano. Gracias... por contármelo».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I, ahem, have always desired only respect, not fear. It is good to know that my efforts have not been in vain. Thank you... for telling me."

languages.text: "Ben, ehem... Daima yalnızca hürmet diledim, korku değil. Çabalarımın nafile olmadığını görmek güzel. Söylediğin için... Teşekkürler."
languages.original_text: "I, ahem, have always desired only respect, not fear. It is good to know that my efforts have not been in vain. Thank you... for telling me."

traits.locale_text: "Ben, ehem... Daima yalnızca hürmet diledim, korku değil. Çabalarımın nafile olmadığını görmek güzel. Söylediğin için... Teşekkürler."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
